patterns: Tell me about the club IET
responses: IET NITK is one of the technical clubs in NITK. For more details, check this out - https://iet-nitk.github.io/about/

patterns: More about members of IET NITK
responses: Check this out - https://iet-nitk.github.io/about/

patterns: What are sigs in IET club?
responses: The sigs present in the club are: Cipher, Rovisp, Torsion, Inkheart, Medium
It mainly include computers and various technologies. However it is open for all branches
It mainly include electronics and technological applications. However it is open for all branches
It mainly include mechanics and applications. However it is open for all branches

Inkheart is our new Lit&Phil SIG for people who are passionate about literature, music etc 
 Follow us on Instagram for some fresh content:https://www.instagram.com/inkheart_ietnitk/
This is a recently introduced SIG. Medium SIG is dedicated to people interested in Media and Marketing. This SIG is still under development

patterns: I am in 1st year, can I apply for club
Is the club open for 3rd years?
Studying in 2nd year can I apply for club?
responses: The club recruits candidates from 2nd and 3rd years. Its open for all branches

patterns: Can I apply for more than 1 sig?
How many sigs can I appear in?
Am I allowed to apply for 2 or 3 sigs?
responses: Candidates can apply for more than one sig. However interviews for them are conducted separately.

patterns: How to get recruited into IET club?
Details about recruitment into IET club
How do I join the club?
responses: The recruitment is held generally during mid-august. Spam regarding the same will be done during the recruitment period.

patterns: Give contact information of any member
How do I contact the IET NITK?
responses: Check it out - https://iet-nitk.github.io/contact/

patterns: Show me some blogs of IET
responses: Check this out for blogs written by our members - https://iet-nitk.github.io/blog/

responses:
Events conducted so far for this academnic year (20-21) are

responses:
